hera.keystore

Interface KeyStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryKeyStore, JavaKeyStore, ServerKeyStore

    @ApiAudience.Private
 @ApiStability.Unstable
public interface KeyStore

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EncryptedPrivateKey export(Authentication authentication)
      Export an private key encrypted.
      java.util.List<Identity> listIdentities()
      Get all the stored identities.
      boolean lock(Authentication authentication)
      Lock an account corresponding to authentication.
      void saveKey(AergoKey key, Authentication authentication)
      Store an AergoKey to the storage.
      void store(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String password)
      Store the keystore to the path.
      Account unlock(Authentication authentication)
      Unlock and return unlocked account.

    • Method Detail

      • saveKey

        void saveKey(AergoKey key,
             Authentication authentication)
        Store an AergoKey to the storage.
        Parameters:
        key - an aergo key to store
        authentication - an authentication to save key
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • export

        EncryptedPrivateKey export(Authentication authentication)
        Export an private key encrypted.
        Parameters:
        authentication - an authentication to used in exporting key
        Returns:
        an encrypted private key.
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • listIdentities

        java.util.List<Identity> listIdentities()
        Get all the stored identities.
        Returns:
        stored identities.
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • unlock

        Account unlock(Authentication authentication)
        Unlock and return unlocked account.
        Parameters:
        authentication - an authentication which is used in unlocking account
        Returns:
        an unlocked account. null if failure
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • lock

        boolean lock(Authentication authentication)
        Lock an account corresponding to authentication.
        Parameters:
        authentication - an authentication which is used in locking account
        Returns:
        a locked account.
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error

      • store

        void store(java.lang.String path,
           java.lang.String password)
        Store the keystore to the path.
        Parameters:
        path - a path
        password - a password used in storing key store
        Throws:
        KeyStoreException - on keystore error
